full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SMON GYIS BSKRUN 'DI NANG GNYEN, ,DAM PA'I MGON GYIS RJES BZUNG RDO RJE'I SPUN, ,DBANG CHOS DU MAS BSKYANGS PA'I DAM LDAN BU BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @024A *, ,(CES 'DI LAS SMON GYIS BSKRUN 'DI NANG GNYEN, ,DAM PA'I MGON GYIS RJES BZUNG RDO RJE'I SPUN, ,DBANG CHOS DU MAS BSKYANGS PA'I DAM LDAN BU, ,BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN MTSAN 'CHANG BA'I, ,PAntI TA YIS BSKUL BA'I GZHAN DBANG GIS, ,DON LA RMONGS SHING TSIG SBYOR MI MKHAS KYANG, ,RLUNG GIS BSKYONG PA'I 'DAB MA BYAR 'GRAN BZHIN, ,DUM BUR BCAD PA'I TSIG 'PHRENG SPEL BA PO, ,DAM PA'I MING 'CHANG GIS BSKRUN DGE BA YANG, ,BDAG GZHAN KUN MKHYEN THOB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG, YI GE'I 'DU BYED BLO LDAN RIG GNAS PA, , @024B KUN DGA' 'JAM DBYANGS KYIS BSKRUN DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
